Headline: #50 Damen Temporary Reroute near Damen/Lake
ShortDescription: 50 Damen buses temp. rerouted SB: Damen, Fulton, Wood, Washington & Damen; NB Damen, Warren, Wood, Fulton & Damen: due to, street blockage near Damen/Lake.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#50 Damen buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions, due to street blockage near Damen/Lake.

Southbound buses will operate via Damen, Fulton, Wood, Washington and Damen.

Northbound buses will operate via Damen, Warren, Wood, Fulton and Damen.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #79 79th Temporary Reroute at 79th/Ashland
ShortDescription: 79 79th buses are temporarily rerouted via 79th, Loomis, 76th, Ashland, & 79th due to street blockage near 79th/Ashland.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#79 79th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 79th, Loomis, 76th, Ashland, & 79th due to street blockage near 79th/Ashland.

Allow extra travel time.
